name: DayGlo Organic Yellow (HT-4796)
description: Hi-Tint dispersions are recommended for in-plant tinting of solvent-based industrial, aerosol and trade sales coatings. These high strength conventional pigment dispersions incorporate high quality pigments in a unique alkyd vehicle system. Each colorant has been formulated for maximum pigment color value while maintaining a wide range of compatibility and characteristics such as non-settling, pourability, flocculation resistance and shelf stability.

Synonyms: 2-[2-(2-Methoxy-4-nitrophenyl)diazenyl]-N-(2-methoxyphenyl)-3-oxobutanamide, C.I. Pigment Yellow 74, Sunbrite Yellow 74, C.I. 11741, C.I. PY 74, PY 74
